title: Hold My Beer
noResponses: Looks like no one dared to try this. Be the first to respond!
welcomeText: Hello there visitor, are you here in the search of fame? Do you want to show your courage? Well, you've come to the right place mate. Hold My Beer is a social networking website based on challenges. As a user you can either come with challenges or respond to them with a video, the greatest challenges will be determined by the number of likes. Everything is as simple as that, just register or log in and let the fun begin!
videoNotSupportedText: Your browser doesn't support video playback
